metadata.title: CVE-2024-5694 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: An attacker could have caused a use-after-free in the JavaScript engine toread memory in the JavaScript string section of the heap. Thisvulnerability affects Firefox < 127.

criterions.comment: firefox package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
thunderbird package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
mozjs52 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs68 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
